This game has a tremendous amount of choices, modes, or maps.  You can play; surf maps, gun game, zombies, ct's vs. t's, plant or defuse, etc.  You can make custom sprays.  This game is the O.G. when it comes to first person shooters.  One of the all time greatest P.C. games ever.

This game isn't nearly as "good" and "exciting" as CSGO, but it definitely has the same feel. It'd graphics are definitely a bit of a downgrade, BUT, it's reviving factor is how it has the OG sounds thatve become memes today. It does have a nice somewhat retro feel to it and that's some I really like. If you want to go back in time in the CS/Valve/Half-Life Era, then you should try this one out.
